'''Steve Wilson''' is an actor based in Ireland.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing the role of [[Theon's master of hounds]].<ref>[https://twitter.com/#!/Dublinactor/status/201956069596086272 Steve Wilson's twitter profile]</ref> He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]].
